General.Description: Such as a Decentralized Liquidity Network, Bancor is one of the powerful cryptocurrency that was built on Ethereum token. Moreover, by using a simple web wallet, this coin is easy to convert to any other token in any network. Furthermore, the BNT support the customers's flexibility of these blockchains, which allows tokens to be locked in reserve and to issue smart tokens on the Bancor system.
General.Features: It is easy for anyone to use BNT because it is open-source and friendly-to-use. The users can convert any token regardless of what time it is and trade volume.
General.Technology: The BNT which was built in Etherum is the first smart token on the Bancor system. By using BNT as one of their reserves, it allows customers to connect them to the BNT network. Furthermore, the platform of BNT where makes the benefits and convert any Ethereum token to others directly through Web3 compatible wallet.
General.Sponsor: The Bancor Network Token was lauched on June 17, 2017 and it was considered as the hub network with Bancor Network. Furthermore, all the tokens in this network can be easily converted to BNT.
